content:
Hi, I’m Davide! 👋 I’m a PhD student of the Crypto@UniCT Group at University of Catania. My supervisor is the professor Dario Catalano.
My research interests are focused on theoretical and pratical aspects of cryptography. A list of my works is on my Research page.
During my master’s degree, I worked as a teaching assistant for various bachelor’s-level courses. This is how I discovered my passion for teaching. After that, I got a position as Temporary Research Fellow at the University of Catania, where I worked on IoT development.
See my Resume for more details.
summary:
Hi, I’m Davide! 👋 I’m a PhD student of the Crypto@UniCT Group at University of Catania. My supervisor is the professor Dario Catalano.

My research interests are focused on theoretical and pratical aspects of cryptography. A list of my works is on my Research page.
